description: A PC Port of Ocarina of Time

SoH_1.0.0.description:
# Our first official release!

We're coming out of the gate strong with a ton of settings available. 

If you're looking for instructions on how to use this, please check out our [GitHub page](https://github.com/HarbourMasters/Archipelago-SoH?tab=readme-ov-file#ship-of-harkinian--archipelago) for links to our setup guide and more.

If you run into issues and would like to report them, or want to see what is planned for the future, please take a look at our [issues page](https://github.com/HarbourMasters/Archipelago-SoH/issues).

**NOTE: Archipelago 0.6.3 or higher is required to play this!**

## A short overview of all features
- Fully built into Ship of Harkinian, so take advantage of everything Ship has to offer
- Many options out of the gate. Go from 360 checks by default to over 1600 when shuffling everything, with additional item shuffles and some QoL settings also available
- Support for Windows, Linux, Mac and Steam Deck
- Built in server console
- Offline play (partially) supported
- Co-op on a single slot supported

## Full changelog

### Client features
- For now this is a separate version of Ship of Harkinian that AP support is built into. Later on this will exist within the main SoH releases. This means you can take advantage of all Ship features, like all enhancements, QoL, check tracker, item tracker, mods for textures/models/custom music, etc.
- Support for Windows, Linux, Mac and Steam Deck
- In the ESC menu inside Ship, there's a built-in server console, connection settings and an option to toggle Death Link
- A fully integrated in-game selector when creating a save to load into an Archipelago save instead
- Offline play support. You need to be connected to AP to create the savefile, but everything after can be played offline. Once you connect again, it'll automatically sync all of your progress.
- Co-op on a single slot supported. Checks will be automatically synced between all players, and most checks will also appear as opened on the other player's game (like chests will be opened, etc). This also means you can make a new savefile on a different PC and continue playing there! Things like in-game flags aren't synced though, like dungeons completed, buttons pushed, etc.
- Automatically connect when loading savefiles. Connection information is saved within your savefile, and it will automatically try to connect when loading into said savefile. You can even have multiple savefiles belonging to different multiworlds at once!
- Custom models for archipelago items, for progression, filler and junk items. When picking up an archipelago item, it'll say what item it was and for what player. Shop items also show this before you buy these!
- Every item that's for you acts entirely like it would in a regular randomizer, including showing the normal model and textbox. They're still synced to the server in the background though!

### Area Access Settings
- Closed Forest
- Kakariko Gate
- Door of Time
- Zoras Fountain
- Sleeping Waterfall
- Jabu Jabu
- Lock overworld doors

### World Settings
- Starting Age
- Gerudo Fortress Carpenters
- Rainbow Bridge, with available options: vanilla, always open, stones, medallions, dungeon rewards, dungeons completed, skull tokens or greg
- Skip Ganon's Trials
- Triforce Hunt

### Shuffle Item Settings
- Shuffle Skull Tokens (with an option to require Sun's Song for nighttime skulls to be in logic)
- Shuffle Master Sword
- Shuffle Child's Wallet
- Shuffle Ocarina Buttons
- Shuffle Swim
- Shuffle Weird Egg
- Shuffle Fishing Pole
- Shuffle Deku Stick Bag
- Shuffle Deku Nut Bag
- Shuffle Freestanding Items

### Shuffle NPC's & Merchants Settings
- Shuffle Shops (from only shuffling vanilla item placements to randomizing 7 shop items per shop)
- Set shop minimum and maximum price points
- Shuffle Fish
- Shuffle Scrubs
- Set scrub minimum and maximum price points
- Shuffle Beehives
- Shuffle Cows
- Shuffle Pots
- Shuffle Crates
- Shuffle Trees
- Shuffle Merchants
- Shuffle Frog Song Rupees
- Shuffle Adult Trade Items
- Shuffle Boss Souls
- Shuffle Fairies (fountains, gossip stones, bean fairies and fairy song spots separately toggle-able)
- Shuffle Grass

### Shuffle Dungeon Items Settings
- Shuffle Dungeon Rewards
- Shuffle Maps & Compasses
- Shuffle Ganon's Boss key, with available options: Vanilla, anywhere, LACS vanilla, LACS stones, LACS medallions, LACS dungeon rewards, LACS dungeons completed, LACS skull tokens
- Key Rings

### Timesaver Settings
- Big Poe Target Count
- Skip Child Zelda
- Skip Epona Race
- Complete Mask Quest
- Skip Scarecrow Song

### Additional Features
- Full wallets
- Bombchu Bag
- Bombchu Drops
- Blue Fire Arrows
- Sunlight Arrows
- Infinite Upgrades
- Skeleton Key
- Slingshot/Bow Break Beehives
- Set ice trap amounts, both by setting an amount, or by setting what % of filler items should be replaced by ice traps

As a reminder, everything outside of the randomizer settings menu inside Ship of Harkinian is also available. All enhancements, all cheats, all mods, everything you'd be able to use in regular Ship gameplay is available here minus Ship's own randomizer features (those are dictated by Archipelago).
SoH_1.0.0.title: SoH Archipelago 1.0.0

SoH_1.1.0.description:
We are expanding our previous release with a batch of much requested features including:
- Anchor Co-op support (we have ran into some issues during testing, so expect potential problems until we figure those out)
- Key sanity settings other than "always on"
- A bunch of other items can be turned off in the item pool
- Added Roc's Feather as a fun bonus item

If you're looking for instructions on how to use this, please check out our [GitHub page](https://github.com/HarbourMasters/Archipelago-SoH?tab=readme-ov-file#ship-of-harkinian--archipelago) for links to our setup guide and more.

If you run into issues and would like to report them, or want to see what is planned for the future, please take a look at our [issues page](https://github.com/HarbourMasters/Archipelago-SoH/issues).

### Caution this version of the AP world is incompatible with other AP world that use any form of entrance shuffling we have a fixed world available [here](https://github.com/HarbourMasters/Archipelago-SoH/releases/tag/SoH_1.1.0-Hotfix). 
please be patient while we work on a proper patch release that addresses the other known issues as well

# Full Change log
### Merged develop into the client branch allowing for Anchor Co-op play!

### Added tricks to logic

### Added prefill shuffles, allowing for more control where the following items appear:
- Kokiri Sword Shuffle
- Ocarina Shuffle
- Gerudo Membership Card Shuffle
- Song Shuffle
- Dungeon key shuffle
- Hideout key shuffle
- Boss key shuffle

### Added item pool options:
- Tycoon wallet, now you can keep all those filler rupees in one place
- Roc's feather, a bonus item that currently has no logic attached to it
- Plentiful item pool option, allowing for more opportunities to find certain items
- Scarce and Minimal item pool options, removing extra items to give you a harder time

### Fixed bugs for:
- Fixed the trial skip option so trials aren't always skipped regardless of the setting
- Players can now collect local items again if they have set an alias
- You can now collect the gift from Rauru if the master sword pedestal has already been collected remotely
- You can now collect the song from Sheik in the Ice caverns if the Iron Boots chest has already been collected
- Early sphere plando items don't get ridiculous prices in shops anymore
- Logic now considers the Goron and Zora tunics from vanilla shop locations as well
- Fixed logic messing up what key belonged to Kakariko Potion Shop and Granny's Shop
- Logic now knows you can't get the kakariko watchtower skultulla with a hammer
- Logic now knows the kakariko gate option allows you to have it open from the start
- Logic now knows adult can't light the torches in Goron city
- Logic now knows adult can't access the bean merchant
- Fixed an issue with the temple of time pedestal item location when master sword isn't shuffled

### Other changes:
- Reduced the amount of items considered progressive based on chosen settings
- Removed the extra shadow temple key from the pool
- Fixed descriptions for the fortress carpenters and sleeping waterfall options
- Updated the bombchu bag option to allow for multiple progressive upgrades

# Known Issues
- Not all tricks in the trick list have been implemented, Please refer to the list in the client's randomizer menu to see which tricks have logic attached to them
- Prefill breaks when combined with games using entrance randomization
- When songs are shuffled into specific locations and extra zelda's lullaby gets shuffled into the pool
SoH_1.1.0.title: SoH Archipelago 1.1.0

SoH_1.1.0-Hotfix.description:
This is an APworld only release to fix the bug that causes this world to fail generation when combined with other games that rely on the `connect_entrances` block.

This fix does not require a new version of the client nor any changes to existing yaml files made with 1.1.0.
Please download the client from the [previous](https://github.com/HarbourMasters/Archipelago-SoH/releases/tag/SoH_1.1.0) release. 

# Full change log
- Fixed Generation issues with other games that use entrance randomization
- Removed extra zeldas lullaby from the item pool
SoH_1.1.0-Hotfix.title: SoH Archipelago 1.1.0 Hotfix

SoH_1.2.0.description:
This is mostly a bugfix release. We wanted to release this as 1.1.1 but sadly we made our client's version checking a little too naïve.

If you're in the middle of preparing a multiworld using SoH 1.1.0 and want to update, please note the following:
- Players will need to update their client to 1.2.0. In the future, we'll be able to release apworld-only releases (which will be versioned 0.0.x going forward).
- Yamls from 1.1.0 are mostly compatible when using 1.2.0, but we removed a bunch of unused tricks from the APWorld, so those will have to be removed from the trick list if players have chosen them. Please check out the updated tricks list in the 1.2.0 default yaml, if the trick is no longer in there, it needs to be removed from your yaml.
- If a host is already very far into organising a multiworld using 1.1.0, consider using our [apworld-only 1.1.0 Hotfix](https://github.com/HarbourMasters/Archipelago-SoH/releases/tag/SoH_1.1.0). Keep in mind when doing so, players need to use the 1.1.0 client as well.

For more information about updating, we've updated our [setup guide](https://github.com/HarbourMasters/Archipelago-SoH/blob/oot-soh/worlds/oot_soh/docs/guide_en.md) with a section on how and when to update your client and/or APWorld.

We're sorry for any inconveniences this has caused. Hopefully our improved version checking in the client will prevent this being necessary in the future.

# Full changelog

- Includes APWorld fixes from the 1.1.0 Hotfix, which fixes generation errors when other games were using entrance rando, and removes a faulty second Zelda's Lullaby from the item pool.
- Removed all unused tricks as options.
- Better version checking in the client.
- Renamed Bombchu Bag item group to Progressive Bombchu Bag.
- Fixed potential issue with the amount of skull tokens that were set to progressive.
- Fixed one piece of heart missing from the item pool.
- Fixed a minor issue in the Universal Tracker not getting proper information about keys.

# Known Issues
- save creation can fail if one of the players in the game uses any special characters in their name such as `é`. 
This problem can be worked around by temporarily giving the offending name an alias during save creation using the /alias command.
- UT isn't aware of shop items.
- Zora Tunic is the wrong price in logic
- Maps and Compass settings isn't set properly in the client
SoH_1.2.0.title: SoH Archipelago 1.2.0

SoH_1.2.1.description:
This is another APworld only patch release fixing a couple of outstanding issues with shuffle location randomization and Universal Tracker

You can still use the client and yaml file from our previous release ([v1.2.0](https://github.com/HarbourMasters/Archipelago-SoH/releases/tag/SoH_1.2.0)).

# Full changelog
- Songs and Medallions now get their locations randomized when they are shuffled to a specific location.
- Marked excess Tokens and Triforce pieces as usefull items.
- Stopped tokens from being placed in priority locations.
- Fixed the amount of tokens that get placed in the world.
- Fixed Zora's tunic price in logic.
- Universal Tracker now knows what the items in shops cost.
- Universal Tracker now knows whether or not the fire temple loop is unlocked.
SoH_1.2.1.title: SoH Archipelago 1.2.1
